\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=3cm,bmargin=3cm,lmargin=3cm,rmargin=3cm}
\setlength{\parskip}{\smallskipamount}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}

\title{CS536: Homework 2}


\author{Sahit Mandala}

\maketitle

\section*{Problem 1}


\subsection*{a) \{SLASH\}\{STAR\}{[}\textasciicircum{}({*}/){]}{*}\{STAR\}\{SLASH\}}

False negative: The pattern doesn't allows for the characters ``/'',''('','')'',
or ``{*}'' to exist within the body of a comment. For example, ``/{*}
Hello / World{*} {*}/'' would be deemed an invalid comment. 


\subsection*{b) \{SLASH\}\{STAR\}(.){*}\{STAR\}\{SLASH\}}

False positive: The pattern allows for the characters ``{*}/'' to
appear within the comment body. For example, ``/{*} Hello {*}/ World
{*}/'' would be deemed a valid comment.


\subsection*{c) \{SLASH\}\{STAR\}({[}\textasciicircum{}{*}{]}{*}\{STAR\}+{[}\textasciicircum{}{*}/{]}){*}\{STAR\}+\{SLASH\}}

False Negative: The pattern requires that every non-empty comment
body contain atleast 1 star. For example, \textbackslash{}{*} Hello
World {*}\textbackslash{} would be deemed invalid because nothing
in the body matches to \{STAR\}+.


\subsection*{d) \{SLASH\}\{STAR\}({[}\textasciicircum{}{*}{]}|{[}\textasciicircum{}/{]})+\{STAR\}\{SLASH\}}

False negative: The pattern requires that the body contains atleast
1 letter. For example, ``/{*}{*}/'' would fail with an empty body.

False positive. The pattern allows ``{*}/'' to occur within the
comment body. For example, ``/{*}{*}/{*}/'' would be a valid comment
since ``{*}/'' satisfies ({[}\textasciicircum{}/{]}){[}\textasciicircum{}{*}{]}.


\subsection*{e) \{SLASH\}\{STAR\}{[}\textasciicircum{}{*}{]}{*}\{STAR\}+\{SLASH\}+}

False negative: The pattern does not allow ``{*}'' to occur before
a letter in the comment body. For example, ``/{*}{*}HelloWorld{*}/''
would be deemed an invalid comment.

False positive: The pattern allows any nonzero number of leading ``/''.
For example, ``/{*}{*}{*}////'' would be deemed a valid comment,
even though the last 3 ``///'' should be cut off/ignored.


\section*{Problem 2}

\{SLASH\}\{STAR\}({[}\textasciicircum{}{*}{]}|(\{STAR\}+{[}\textasciicircum{}{*}/{]})){*}\{STAR\}+\{SLASH\}
\end{document}
